official_title: Coverage and Cost-of-Care Links Financial Navigation Program in Hematology and Blood and Bone Marrow Transplantation (BMT)
inclusion_criteria:
* hematological cancer patients from the Division of Hematology and Bone Marrow Transplantation at the University of Kentucky
* caregivers of cancer patients
* positive screening for financial hardship
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 100 Years
